summary: An email from an unknown sender to an unknown recipient regarding Jeffrey Epstein's pretrial status, noting that Epstein now has four attorneys with him. The email is addressed to an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Mentioned as being at a pretrial proceeding with four attorneys present.

events.title: Epstein Pretrial Status Update
events.description: An email is sent noting that Jeffrey Epstein is at a pretrial proceeding and now has four attorneys with him.

locations.name: One Saint Andrew's Plaza
locations.context: Address of the Assistant United States Attorney's office in the Southern District of New York.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated July 8, 2019, regarding Jeffrey Epstein's pretrial status.
It states that Epstein was at a pretrial proceeding and had four attorneys with him.
The email is addressed to an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York.
